Name: The Lennox
Ingredients: 15 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass. Special ingredient #1 Homemade banana syrup (1:1)
History: South African Bacardí Legacy 2015 winning cocktail by Denzel Heath at Thirst in Cape Town.
Nutrition: One serving of The Lennox contains 158 calories
